programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler goes to his daughter's university to discuss rape prevention at a rally, but accusations of rape arise during the rally and Stabler and Benson investigate conflicting accounts and fiery accusations without any evidence to support claims.

programme.desc: While an ex-undercover detective, Brian Cassidy, prepares to testify against a pimp named Bart Ganzel, a woman comes forward and accuses him of rape; the prosecutions push for a victory during the case has surprising consequences.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a popular sports reporter comes to Detective Benson and accuses her cameraman of rape, the SVU team begins preparations for a hard fought trial, but events take a turn when the victim finds out that she may be pregnant from the assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a concert quickly develops into mass chaos, a teenage suburban girl finds herself the victim of a gang rape, which Detective Amaro is having a difficult time solving due to conflicting accounts from both eyewitnesses and friends alike.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an undercover investigation leads to a popular mayoral candidate and a close childhood friend of ADA Barba, the SVU team has to put faith in their colleague to put his friendships aside, and prosecute the men that he has looked up to for years.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young military officer is arrested for a DUI while on leave, the police notice signs that she had been raped, and call Detective Benson for help, but the woman refuses to aid in the investigation due to fear of damaging her reputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A friend of Detective Rollins presses charges against her lover for rape, but her penchant for rough sex and the he-said she-said nature of the case make it difficult to investigate, until the case suddenly becomes a murder investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman answers a modeling ad to help pay for her tuition, not realizing that the job would escalate into online pornography, and when her classmates find out about it, the fine line between entertainment and real life gets crossed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A feud between the wife of a famous author and his daughters turns ugly as they fight for control of his estate and his well being, which becomes a criminal case when the wife is accused of abusing him; Barba deals with his own family issues.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The futures of two high school students are at stake when a rape case boils down to the confessions of the accused, but each of them says the other is lying and finding justice might mean destroying the reputations of both by uncovering everything.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman is followed home and raped just outside her apartment building, several neighbors are named witnesses to the crime, but the detectives are all confused why no one called for help or is willing to testify in court.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The reputation of the entire SVU unit is compromised when a devious man accused of rape and murder begins to threaten the people working the case by trying to expose their personal secrets, causing friction within the squad.
